db:info.db:title: Qt Lottie Animation
db:info.db:edition: Qt Lottie Animation | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Display graphics and animations exported by the Bodymovin plugin for Adobe After Effects.

db:article.db:para: Qt Lottie Animation provides a QML API for rendering graphics and animations that are exported in JSON format by the Bodymovin plugin for Adobe After Effects.

db:section.db:title: Limitations
db:section.db:para: The implementation follows the master specification for bodymovin. Deviations in exported Bodymovin files compared to the specification are taken into account as much as possible when differences are noticed.

db:listitem.db:para: the timeline only supports frame-mode, not time-mode
